title: Google Play Review
body: As a loyal customer of swiggy,I was excited to sign up for their swiggy one lite membership,hoping to enjoy exclusive benefits.However,Upon ordering,i noticed a significant increase in the menu prices compared to my previous orders.This price hike not only nullified any potential savings from the membership but also left me feeling deceived and disappointed.it seems unfair that loyal customers who invest in the premium membership are being penalized with higher prices.

title: Google Play Review
body: I had a horribly bad experience with this. I had ordered food for my mother while she was in Thiruvananthapuram. I live in Gujarat. I had located the place on their map and typed the address after that. After 45 minutes I tried to contact the delivery partner and he told me he was not able to reach the correct location as I had marked the place wrong. After that I got a call from their customer service and told me they are cancelling the order and I willl not get even one rupee as refund.

title: Google Play Review
body: I used swiggy or instamart 2-3 times every week. Now I'm seeing that the offers, services etc. are degrading. Zomato gives much more offers to gold users. Instamart has started scamming, I ordered a knife with product description about knife. Images makes it feel like normal knife, but they sent a toy knife. When I complained, they removed it from suggestions (it was in the stock), but were not remorseful about this sort of scam.
